column4: if you're running Hardy don't follow the Feisty thread on xinerama.. video is controlled differently in Hardy.. it uses xRandr.. look for information on that.
i'm using feisty, not hardy. so no fancy xrandr hardy stuff for me...
check out http://paste.ubuntu.com/47312/  it's from some old notes I made getting xinerama to work on Dapper and will probably work on Feisty.. it's been a while

yea, besides some nvidia-specific stuff, that's basically what mine looks like as well. the thing is, it basically works, just doesn't use the correct resolution on the external monitor... so i'm guessing i need to figure out what some of those warnings coming out of xorg.0.log mean...
